alert.note: Alert for White Pine and Northeast Nye Counties (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 03 at 11:03PM PDT until July 04 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT MONDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 425... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 425 White Pine and Northeast Nye Counties. * Winds...South 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 9 percent. * Impacts...The combination of gusty winds and low humidity will create critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A red flag warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: White Pine and Northeast Nye Counties
